Cost-effective grid-connected solar systems on commercial buildings can offset high peak electric cost and make an excellent investment for many businesses.
A typical grid-connected PV system consists of PV modules, output cables, module mounting structures, AC and DC disconnect, switches, inverter(s), grounding equipment and a metering system.
